Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: A great pub along the canal. Food was great and moderately priced. They a a good selection of beers on tap. I would recommend to a friend and eat here again.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: I live in Amsterdam and had not been to this place in a while. I went there to enjoy a drink with my wife and two kids on a Sunday afternoon. The place was busy, but with a large number of waiters present service should have been much …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Truly unique Dutch old place with a character . Very cosy and an amazing canal view. Highly recommended

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text:
Honestly a little gem of a restaurant.

Warm ambiance, welcoming staff, and excellent food. The portions might be …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: A friendly place with a terrace along the canal. Two special dishes are highly recommend: the cheese fondue and the mussels. Different but both very good. The portion is bigger than usual and the "soupe" that is left after eating the mussels is fantastic. Small selection of wines but enough variety to suit all tastes.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: If I could give them more stars I would! Place is incredible, really nice and typical despite being not full of tourists. Staff and waiters are the nicest and most professional ever. We have been treated so well. Fondue is of course to try …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Pretty terrible experience here today. We had visitors staying who fancied stopping for a beer and a snack en route home on a rainy Sunday afternoon. The waiter was rude as we sat down and then proceeded to serve nothing and nobody for 20minutes. Eventually we gave up and went round the corner to somewhere more welcoming.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Amazing place, great place for coffee, beer and brunch. The customer service par excellence. veggie burger Apple pie with special liquor - and the friendly crew to serve the customers. A word of appreciation to them Must visit in Amsterdam

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Cool vibe, nice 80s music and tasty food. I had a couple of dishes which would be specific to the region and they were nice. The beer recommendations provided were solid too!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text:
Very warm and friendly service and a great burger.

Relaxed atmosphere with a good mix of locals and travellers. …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Very cool place to have a drink and some food, with a good view of one of the canals. There are lots of different beers and gin to try and the staff were very helpful with their recommendations. The snack tasting plate was amazing, the wild boar croquettes were fantastic, as was the liverwurst.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: This is a restaurant, not a destillery. As long as you are clear on that you will be fine off. Attentive service and friendly staff together with great jenever and gin asortement. Also with decent food, but that is not the reason to go here.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Great place for a drink and some food. Nice  location without all the tourist nonsense most cafes and restaurants have around the canals.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: The interior of this location is really nice and invites on the first view. The range of genever is outstanding. Additional, the sandwiches are very tasty so you don't have to switch locations to eat. I can recommend this place!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Absolutely amazing! We had the small platter and cheese fondue, along with two Heinekens.  Friendly service with a great view of the canal.  Would recommend!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Friendly personal, good bear and tasty eat. This all what you need from this place

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Loved stumbling upon it while exploring the city! Mostly local people, which in a touristy city already gives you a good impression! The staff was very friendly and recommended us a local beer that we enjoyed with some frites! Beat to book …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Great experience and fantastic explanation of all the Gin's history and tastings, for all that like Gin in its perfection, highly recommended

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Friendly staff, tasty food, good beer selection,  cool ambiance, sweet local cat! The deer stew was great.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Delicious food excellent beers cozy nice waiters.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Excellent service and beer. Old cheese was also wonderful!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: The place to go if you want to be drunk beyond belief, sample excellent liqueurs or be amazed by incredibly knowledgeable staff.   Awesome atmosphere as well.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: A great little find just on the Herengracht. With heaters outside and a cosy interior, the staff were extremely friendly. The food was superb, and as it was a little late as the chef was on his own, they offered us free drinks as an …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: The staff are super friendly! They explained the liquors to us and made all sorts of jokes. We also had the muscles and they were absolutely phenomenal! Really a great place!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Beautiful place, great food and fantastic staff especially Leonardo.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: I had heard good things about this restaurant however I was disappointed. I cannot recommend this place at all. The service checked in regularly on our table, but that is the best thing I can say. The food was terrible.  The fondue, had too …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Quite warm- nice place.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Pretty place and nice food but terrible service.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Really nice place! Waiters were really nice! We thought it would be a very touristic place that often don’t seem very authentic but not at all! A plus for the Fondue

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Very lovely place, decent prices for beer given the location and very friendly bar staff. Extra points for the patio heaters giving you a view over prinsengracht, but points deducted for slow outdoor service. Will be coming back for re-evaluation soon!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Maybe we were unlucky but we experienced very very bad service. Waiter forgot orders and simply didn't want to do his job. Food is ok but nothing extraordinary. I had cheese fondue and it wasn't that special. Cute location. Toilets were messy and damaged

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Best apple pie in Amsterdam. We had a nice dinner here. The staff was friendly. The apple pie was amazing. It was served with vanilla ice cream, whipped cream, a chocolate with liquor inside, and a small shot of cinnamon liquor. We tried to go back the next day but they had a staff retreat. Really, try the apple pie.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: A. van wees is the go to for a great selection of beers and genever with tasty bites. The A. van Wees distillery is just around the corner in the Jordaan, and the decor inside the proeflokaal is one of the best - high ceilings, wood …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Service was excellent.  Not the fastest ever but did not stand out as slow compared to anywhere else we visited in Europe.  We visited on a Thursday during the day and were some of the few customers in the spot.  Bitterballen were …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Really charming location and decent price for beers. We ordered a snack platter but after waiting 30 mins we had to leave and the platter was nowhere to be seen. Also slow service to get the beers. They also served food (which smelled good but we were only there for drinks)

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Very nice place, great mood, nice waiters. The meat could be better though. My main issue is that I was sick the entire night after eating at there. Maybe it was just bad luck, to be noted though.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: If you want a genever experience (apparently pre dates gin ) you can get a flight of them with old cheese and cured meat.   Then order some food (mixed appetizer).  Wonderful experience.   Servers knew what they were talking about. Loved it!!!  We are Canadians  celebrating Canada day in Amsterdam.   Perfect evening.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: We don't recommend this place to anybody. It seems that the waiters here do not like to help clients. The staff left empty tables dirty for a long time and helped newer customers earlier than us. We asked them twice for help they did not …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Also known as "The Admiral", A. van Wees is a combination of tasting house, cafe and restaurant. The building was constructed on the site of a horse stable and still retains the original floor tiles. Here you can taste 17 different jenever …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: The worst experience in Amsterdam. Waiter kept on saying we were rude with no reason. Brought in 8 family members to have bottle if wine. Never felt so uncomfortable. Even said whem I paid the bill we were rude. Have no words

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text:
DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
We booked a table.
On arrival the staff looked confused as to why we were there. …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Nice cozy place to have drinks and meal. The steak was amazing, the bread & herb butter a must plus a visit from one of the restaurant cats that napped by my side made my evening.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Nice for drinks but over priced food, small portions, not worth the trip.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: TOURISTS DO NOT GO HERE. WAITERS WILL TRY TO STEAL FROM YOU. The man with the dark black hair tried to steal 10 euros from me. When I pointed out that the change was wrong he rolled his eyes at me and gave me dirty looks on his way to take …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Friendly and attentive service, top class service you rarely get in Amsterdam. Great food and atmosphere. Highly recommended.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Lets start of with a compliment: the mussels were nice and the experience has potential for a nice night out. …

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: The place to chill and enjoy a cold beer and some snacks.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: We didn't actually eat here, but the place looked really nice, I especially liked the doors to the the restrooms. The service was a bit slow. The prices are good.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Simple dishes, quality materials, reasonable prices and the real prize is the great service. A very nice place to have a bite,  glass of good beer and a smoke.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Really good food and a nice atmosphere by the canal. Service was really friendly and is overall a great spot for lunch or dinner.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Great atmospheric place to sample Dutch gin in an authentic gin distillery. Great value. Brilliant atmosphere. Lovely staff.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Very nice location and friendly staff. Good sharing platter to taste good local food. Very good food and ambience!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: I was so impressed. I had the Genever tasting which did not fail to impress. Very helpful staff that explained everything. Superb professionals. Try Genever here first. Don't go to BOLS!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Great place to relax and watch Amsterdam life go by. Good cocktails, pleasant, accommodating service.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Amazing atmosphere in this historical Amsterdam brewery. One of the best brewery in town, definitely worth a visit

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: By far the most authentic place in Amsterdam! The jenevers are sublime, and the beers are cold :)

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Great interior and food, very good jenever,  and good srrvice.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Very cosy and friendly atmosphere, even with the waiter dealing with difficult situations. Would come back

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Service was terribly slow. Food was ok and atmosphere was good. Wouldn’t rush to come back here though.

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Super friendly service, great beer & food !

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Super nice staff and tasty drinks. Loved it!

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: Location and ambiance are fantastic. Wine, spirits and Chocomel. The latter being the reason we stopped by

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
Review Text: I really recommend the Fondue + The Apple Pie (served with vanilla ice cream).

Name: A. van Wees Proeflokaal
